record.id: field.name="$param.validateOutboundResScript" and file.name="SMISConfiguration" and term=NULL and format.name="wizard-case.exchange.param.format" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: $param.validateOutboundResScript
record.file.name: SMISConfiguration
record.format.name: wizard-case.exchange.param.format

brief.brief: Specify additional Javascript function to validate and parse the response body of outbound request.
The function returns the parsed external ID if the validation succeeds, and returns “False” if the validation fails.

detail.detail: If you do not specify this field, Case Exchange only validates the HTTP code and retrieves the ID according to the definitions in the Inbound tab.
